website_summaries.verdict: This highly-rated brand offers smaller bamboo brush sets for children alongside adult-sized options.
pros: Bristles are soft-medium strength for a moderate and comfortable brush
cons: Many customers complained that the bristles fell out after heavy use

customer_reviews.title: Bristles fall out A LOT
customer_reviews.text: I have never left a negative review on Amazon but I was so dissatisfied with these brushes I had to. I want to comment first that I have used other brands of bamboo brushes before and never experienced this. The amount of bristles that fall out each time is appalling. It’s not merely a cosmetic issue. It’s a safety issue. I have had several bristles fall out in my mouth causing me to gag. I have accidentally swallowed at least two, which was extremely painful. I would never recommend these to anyone and am genuinely surprised that they have such great reviews!
customer_reviews.author: Carisa Zuniga Trejo

customer_reviews.title: Works Great for My Doxies
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying my hardest to avoid contaminating the planet with more plastic and my dogs needed new toothbrushes. I searched for something made for dogs that is Eco-friendly and came up empty. I already buy bamboo toothbrushes for myself and figured I could just get baby toothbrushes for them again. These are a good size and shape and have worked out well so far. I'm happy knowing that my discarded toothbrush will probably not end up in the nostril of a sea turtle.
customer_reviews.author: KvnDhrty

customer_reviews.title: Too soft, takes some getting use to
customer_reviews.text: For me it's as pleasant to use as brushing with a wooden tongue depressor but I could learn to accept that my bigger disappointment is bristles are too soft. Much softer than medium in my opinion. I like firm for tongue brushing and this leaves my mouth feeling unclean despite having just brushed. They say firm is not good for teeth and gums but I have the patience to brush very gently and methodically. I need something that feels like it's cleaning. Perhaps I missed it but I didn't see firm as an option, if it were I may have given 4 stars instead of 3.
customer_reviews.author: Simple rustic guy

customer_reviews.title: Product redesign?
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought I received a knockoff product or ordered the wrong model. This new toothbrush feels a lot less dense than previous purchases almost like bass wood. The branding is much different as you can see in the photos. I have yet to try it, but wanted to give all potential buyers a heads up. Left is the product ordered April 2017 and the right is ordered September 2017. Update: This toothbrush functions about the same. Having adult braces cause it to lose some bristles here and there, but nothing too extreme.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. Eco Friendly!
customer_reviews.text: The handle: The bamboo handle (very sustainable material) is really well crafted. It is smooth, sturdy, and well-sanded (I've never gotten a splinter). It's also well proportioned and feels very comfortable in my adult-sized hands. The bristles: Well designed to reach where I need it to reach. Well attached (I've used other bamboo brushes whose bristles come out and get stuck in my gums or I swallow them), so this is great! The summary: If you're considering a more eco-friendly toothbrush, this is an excellent choice! Buy with confidence! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Robert K.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good quality toothbrush. The head is flat though which took some getting used to - it can feel more rough on the mouth. Also it is bamboo so it’s a good idea to set/hang the toothbrush someone where it can dry completely and not set it in a cup where liquid collects at the bottom because it will start to mold. Overall we’re happy with it and feel good knowing we’re making an environmentally healthy product choice.
customer_reviews.author: Aneek360

customer_reviews.title: Best Bamboo Brush
customer_reviews.text: I've used a few different brands, this one is the best. The bristles are not so soft that they don't clean my teeth, but not so hard that they hurt my gums--perfect. Also, the way the bristles are shaped helps reach difficult places and my teeth feel really clean. The handle is easy to grip and does not slip. I will continue to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R

customer_reviews.title: Best toothbrush I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would meet a toothbrush that makes me never want to stop brushing once I've started, but "Hello, Mother's Vault Bamboo toothbrush, it's so lovely to make your acquaintance!" The bristles are super soft, and they clean my teeth perfectly. My favorite aspect is that the bristles are LONG, and combined with their softness, it's like an exquisite massage for your gums. I have an extremely sensitive gum line and sensitive teeth, and so far this brush has not triggered any of my nerve spots. I'll never buy another toothbrush as long as Mother's Vault is in business.
customer_reviews.author: Henry and Ziva's Mum

customer_reviews.title: Great all natural manual toothbrush.
customer_reviews.text: We are very satisfied with these toothbrushes. Out of the 4 pack of brushes, only one had the problem of losing its bristles and that was after almost 4 months of use. We try to change ours out every 3-5 months. We didn't have any problem with molding handles as some reported, but we have an open bottom holder so that is most likely the reason. The cleaning level is high quality and the contour of the bristles worked for us. I will be purchasing these again.
customer_reviews.author: Gerszewski Family

customer_reviews.title: I love these.
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to reduce my carbon print by using things that are biodegradable, or simply not harmful to the environment. I bought a pack of these for my boyfriend and I. I love mine, and he said he likes his, too. But he thinks he will need time to get used to it because he feels that the bristles are a little linger on this toothbrush. I don't really notice any difference, but everyone is different. I definitely recommend these toothbrushes. I will probably be getting my siblings some of these for Christmas. No joke.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Best Bamboo Toothbrushes
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few different brands of bamboo toothbrushes and I've enjoyed Mother's Vault the most!! I will definitely be buying these again. The packaging is very minimal as described (other than Amazon's envelope package) which is great. The toothbrush handles are smooth and comfortable. The toothbrush also has a nice look on my bathroom countertop. The bristles were slightly strong at first but after a few uses, I "broke" it in and everything's great. I'm happy I've found a bamboo toothbrush that is both good for my health and the planet! I would definitely recommend these bamboo toothbrushes. I'll be a repeat buyer! Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C.

customer_reviews.title: Toothbrush love!
customer_reviews.text: I am a dental hygienist in Virginia. I have used every toothbrush ever made, and these are fabulous! I love that the brush is biodegradable. It also really dies a good job at getting teeth clean. I actually have been reccomeding them to my patients! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: amy l ayres

customer_reviews.title: I like the woodden handle and general idea of this toothbrush ...
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a little bit more. The bristles are really hard and I hurt my gums each time. The gead is big and I have troubles reaching all the way down my mouth. I like the woodden handle and general idea of this toothbrush and the packaging is cool, but not happy with that product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Ro

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The bristles are very soft and cover more ground on my teeth surface because of the length (not as long as other toothbush head's bristles that I usually buy from the store). The toothbush dries pretty quickly after use and doesn't retain any kind of soggy, wet odor after using it, especially since it's made of bamboo but my family and I all love using it. And it's biodegradable!
customer_reviews.author: Chugsie

customer_reviews.title: Great toothbrushes!
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted to try a bamboo toothbrush for a while, but so many of them come in plastic cases. That defeats the purpose! These come in a cardboard box. They are a nice size and the bristles are soft. I will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Seacoast Mom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent alternative to wasteful plastic toothbrushes!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using my bamboo toothbrush for a little over a week and I have absolutely NO complaints! The bristles are just right and none of them have fallen out. The bamboo does feel a little different from typical plastic toothbrushes, but it is in no way uncomfortable. I feel great every time I use this toothbrush because I know it is more environmentally friendly than plastic, produces less waste, and is just an all around excellent alternative to typical brushes. I even find myself looking forward to brushing my teeth every morning and night now! I encourage everyone to give these toothbrushes a chance, I don't think you'll regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Awsome!
customer_reviews.text: I luv my toothbrush. The package is compostable so it benefits my organic herbs n fruits i have planting. The bristles r not 2 harsh, n not extremely soft like others hav mentioned. My experience with it is awsome. Yes i had 2 pull a few single bristles out but its ok. At least it dont bend out of shape like other tooth brushes aftr letting it dry. With this toothbrush it keep its shape. Easy 2 clean. Feels gud when I'm brushn. I soak the brush once a week with ACV, baking soda, & distilled water. I will b buyn mor of these.
customer_reviews.author: plush furr

customer_reviews.title: I love these toothbrushes
customer_reviews.text: I love these toothbrushes! I am an RDH. My husband likes the Sonicare, which is an excellent toothbrush. But for those of if who just want a good manual brushing, this brush does the trick with soft curvy bristled, and an easy-to-hold handle. My 15-year-old really likes his! I like it bc it's effective, eco-friendly, and pretty in a toothbrush stand. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Spoonie32

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase and environmentally friendly.
customer_reviews.text: We really love these. The handle feels nice and it looks great in the bathroom (not an eyesore like plastic ones). And I love that it’s environmentally friendly. I don’t find any issue with shedding of the bristles.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Ricottone

customer_reviews.title: Fine, but the brush is too big for my mouth
customer_reviews.text: These toothbrushes were the first bamboo ones that I tried. I liked them for the most part, but decided to try other brands to find one with a smaller brush for my mouth - this one was too big! However, I have a small mouth, so it's not like the brushes are giant or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Renae Inuwa

customer_reviews.title: Plastic alternative
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I wanted to reduce my plastic waste from toiletries. They brush well and are comfortable in the mouth. My only complaint is that the wood seems to absorb water from brushing and takes a while to dry completely.
customer_reviews.author: Killian Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: These are too big for the mouth and are so rough, they sandpaper the lips. And the bristles are HARD, not medium. Unusable. What a shame, plastic toothbrushes are terrible to throw away in the millions as we do. But these are terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Erikopolous

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great quality at a great price. We replace ours every 3 months. One box will last one persona while year! Never had any problems with mold or splitting. Great brush! Cleans well. Love the brand. Love the compostable no plastic packaging!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Too hard and weirdly shaped
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the lack of plastic in the product and it makes me feel good using it, but I won't be buying again because the bristles are way too hard. They also have a strange shape, maybe for tongue brushing? The shape makes it difficult to brush the roof of my mouth. Now I need to use 3 more hard brushes before I can switch to a better toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: BeccaAaAa

customer_reviews.title: Rough edges and loose bristles
customer_reviews.text: I gave this three stars because i love the concept, however, compared to other brands, i don't feel like the quality of this product was good. The first brush i tried had some rough edges which made me fear i would get a splinter from my toothbrush - not good! The second brush I tried has bristles falling out. I would probably not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: jottjen

customer_reviews.title: Great product for us!
customer_reviews.text: We have had no problem switching to these toothbrushes. They have held up very well and we have not had issues with the bristles coming out as others have mentioned. No molding problems like others mentioned but we do not leave them sitting in cups/holders with water in the bottom. They are soft and clean as well as all the other plastic handled toothbrushes we have purchased over 40+years. Very glad this family has made the switch to these much more earth friendly toothbrushes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft bristles, smooth bamboo, makes you feel good!
customer_reviews.text: The bristles are great, nice and soft. The handle feels really sturdy and smooth, not a single flaw in the the one I am using. Even better this brush makes me WANT to brush my teeth and I feel great knowing it's eco-concsious. I can't wait to decorate the handle too! One minor critique that has a lot to do with personal preference. The head of the brush is a little bit large, as a result it can be uncomfortable when I brush my deep set molars. However I have TMJ so my jaw doesn't open very wide without discomfort already.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: I thought these would be better to be honest
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be better to be honest. They have smooth heads but -- compared to a regular plastic toothbrush -- they don't glide easily in your mouth, and it feels like you're passing a cotton ball all over the inside of your mouth, yikes. Oh the sacrifices I make for the sake of producing less waste.
customer_reviews.author: PearCloud

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: The brushes are durable in my opinion. I’ve used it for a month or two now and the bristles haven’t fallen out for me yet (unlike other reviews which is great for me!). Only thing I wish is that the breach head is a little wider. But I love them anyway!
customer_reviews.author: StassMaster

customer_reviews.title: I love the idea that they are environmentally friendly
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea that they are environmentally friendly! I have been looking for something to replace my regular toothbrush as here in the US you cannot recycle them. The brushing part is very long on these toothbrushes and I had to get used to it. The hardness is def not soft but medium. I wish they were a bit softer. Because of that I am giving only 4 stars. Other than that I am very happy with these. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina T.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived open
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t tried it yet but received this item today in the mail. Comes in a cardboard box with tape on top and bottom. Both pieces of tape were cut open. Looks like this item was returned. Toothbrushes still look new but disconcerting to see that.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and appreciate the recyclable materials
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and appreciate the recyclable materials. I would disagree that these are soft bristles. Maybe after several uses? I normally use ultra soft brushes as I have sensitive gums. I would categorize the bristles on this as medium to hard.
customer_reviews.author: Heather T.

customer_reviews.title: Yaaas!! Perf.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. I expected them to taste like wood - they do not. I expected them to not brush well - they are great. I expected the bristles to either be too hard or too soft - they were perfectly soft. I really love these tooth brushes. They are the only ones I will use from now on. I have suggested them to all of my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Danylle Leonard

customer_reviews.title: BEST BAMBOO TOOTHBRUSHES
customer_reviews.text: LOVEEEE these toothbrushes! I am on my last one and will definitely reorder, I love the brand and that the packaging is eco-friendly as well. I have tried other bamboo toothbrushes and they just don't hold up as well as Mother's Vault. 100% recommend these bamboo brushes over any others.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Great company, good product
customer_reviews.text: I love the eco-friendliness of these brushes, however we were surprised how small they were! They are a similar size to toddler toothbrushes. After using them for a couple days, we got used to it. Now, it is a favorite! It's convenient to really get into the harder to reach places, especially for my daughter. Will be buying again! The company also reaches out right away to make sure their customer is satisfied. That is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Bia

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: There is some type of flaw in the design because it feels like I'm getting tiny cuts in my mouth every time I brush with these. Unfortunately, I'm going to have to throw them out. It's a shame because I love the business model and was hoping to reduce my carbon footprint by using biodegradable toothbrushes.
customer_reviews.author: isabelle ibarra

customer_reviews.title: worth buying!
customer_reviews.text: written by wife of account holder: i am forever looking for ways to not bring so many toxins and chemicals in to our lives. i like these toothbrushes for that. i feel better not putting plastic in my mouth. these are nice to look at, they are great toothbrushes, and i use them as garden markers when i am done with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jim & Nancy Yates

customer_reviews.title: Second time I've ordered these. Smooth feel. Bristles ...
customer_reviews.text: Second time I've ordered these. Smooth feel. Bristles work just as well (as far as I can tell) as those on any other toothbrush I've used. And these have a role in the life cycle beyond brushing my teeth. When I can't use them to brush anymore, they can become cleaning tools, plant markers, and one day, fuel for my fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: Nashville Mom

customer_reviews.title: These brushes are simply GREAT! They feel nice in the mouth
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are simply GREAT! They feel nice in the mouth, brussels and bamboo, they massage everything so gentle but are still firm. The question here is: how long are they going to last and stay efficient? Will try to update this rating. Away from plastic these are a good substitute and also have an acceptable price.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Moon born

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toothbrush, just don't swallow individual bristles.
customer_reviews.text: Would be a 5/5 but unfortunately, at least with my shipment, some of the bristles started to come out after one use. This is the first time purchasing from Mothersvault, so I'll give them the benefit of the doubt and assume the issue with bristle integration is a one-off event. The toothbrush is still functional, of course, but I now need to make sure I don't swallow any individual bristles. Otherwise--an excellent toothbrush, with very soft bristles that feel great on the teeth and mouth. The natural bamboo handle feels great in hand and knowing that we're impacting the environment less is a SUPER+ Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bamboo toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: This is the first bamboo toothbrush I have tried. Wanted to switch to bamboo to be more sustainable. Have only been using for a few days so can't speak to how it will hold up over time but so far so good. The bristles are what you would expect for a non-electric toothbrush. They aren't too soft or too hard and seem to clean my teeth well . The handle is comfortable in my hand and dries quickly. Thanks for making this product!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Very nice brushes
customer_reviews.text: Very nice toothbrushes. I am on my third one; they hold up very well. Softer bristle and have not noticed any loose bristles. Feel better that my toothbrushes are now eco-friendly. :)
customer_reviews.author: Turquoise Waters

customer_reviews.title: Toothbrushes
customer_reviews.text: I like these toothbrushes with one exception: the bristles are too short. It felt weird to use this brush at first because I guess normal toothbrushes have longer bristles. It was annoying for a week or two, then I got used to it and they're fine now.
customer_reviews.author: EricaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Toothbrushes
customer_reviews.text: I love these!! They don't seem any different to me than any other toothbrush...they're just better!! The handle feels nice, the brush gets all your teeth. The brush is also holding up well...no bent bristles, no bristles falling out. Good price for bamboo brushes. Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jaline

customer_reviews.title: Great first bamboo brush
customer_reviews.text: I was cautiously optimistic about switching to a bamboo brush. I had read several scary reviews about poor construction and bristles falling out while brushing, but I haven't had any of those problems with this brush. The bristles are anchored well and provide a firm but gentle scrub. The only thing I'd change is to make the head of the brush a bit smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L Shope

customer_reviews.title: I am a dentist and I love these! our whole family uses them!
customer_reviews.text: I love that these are friendly to the earth! no plastic at all in the packaging! great feel to the toothbrush, works great on my teeth, couldn't be happier! highly recommend! I am a dentist and this makes me feel great knowing that I am not adding to the millions+ toothbrushes that will be buried in our earth for future generations to find.
customer_reviews.author: ajgb22

customer_reviews.title: Great and environmentally friendly
customer_reviews.text: Loving these. No bristles have escaped yet and that’s exactly what I was worried about with bamboo toothbrushes. I got these for my two year old and they are a good size for her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These toothbrushes easily last me 3 months a piece and my conscience is calm knowing I'm not using as much plastic as before. They are smooth on the back and I have never experienced irritation. The bristles are soft, but are good at cleaning. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MOLD
customer_reviews.text: I received a new package of these 5 weeks ago and just opened it to get a new toothbrush. I found mold growing on 2 of the 4 toothbrushes. I wonder if anyone else has had this problem.
customer_reviews.author: PaP, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: Decent product but bristles becomes undone after one week's worth of use
customer_reviews.text: This toothbrush has some potential but please revisit the bristle design. After one week's use, some bristles had started to come undone and I've also had to spit out two loose bristles after brushing! Other than that,a good start for what I can see will be a great product (after said issue is resolved).
customer_reviews.author: Dakine72

customer_reviews.title: Ehh.... quality was OK.
customer_reviews.text: The quality was OK on these. I didn't expect to have to go through a new toothbrush every 30 days but we did. We bought quite a few too so that was disappointing. I want to support American Made products and eco products but I will be looking for alternatives. Love the design and simplicity with these.
customer_reviews.author: The Simple Baby Life

customer_reviews.title: Nice Eco-Friendly Natural Toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy these eco-friendly toothbrushes. At first, the wood tends to stick to your cheeks. But, with use, it smoothes out and doesn't stick. I bought a similar one from another brand with carbon bristles, but I like this one more because it has a larger bristle bed, so you brush more teeth at once.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Lamberti

customer_reviews.title: Great Eco-friendly, affordable toothbrush!
customer_reviews.text: A little rough at the beginning but the bristles become soft like any other toothbrush after 4-5 uses. I’m still not sure if the bristles are biodegradable but the bamboo base is a great factor.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A.

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best manual toothbrush there is
customer_reviews.text: These toothbrushes are incredible. You might think a toothbrush is a toothbrush, but not so. The bristles on these are as soft and smooth as silk, and what's not to like about the whole thing being biodegradable? And they are stylish to boot. Even though the product comes as a set of four, each toothbrush is individually packaged, which makes it convenient to transport to work or wherever. I've been so impressed, I'm going to order more in case they disappear.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Viva La Toothy!
customer_reviews.text: I like these very much! The bristles are softer than the softest pharmacy bought tooth brushes I could find and they are simple -- no fancy jagged patters, just a nice contour for the teeth! I love the feeling that my mouth is clean without thinking my gums are taking a toll! And I have to add that the wooden handle is pretty rad, too!
customer_reviews.author: Phillicia Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: They're great! Ordered two of them for myself and my ...
customer_reviews.text: They're great! Ordered two of them for myself and my boyfriend, and the wood allowed me to draw on them a bit to distinguish them, very fun. Haven't had any problems with the handle mildewing, I've been lighting drying it off with a towel after each use. The wood on the head is a bit clunky maneuvering it around the back of your mouth (dirty joke not intended), but I wouldn't really take off a star for that, just takes a couple brushes to get used to.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Shea

customer_reviews.title: eco-friendly toothbrushes for awhile and I really like these. I also so appreciate the compostable packaging ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using compostable, eco-friendly toothbrushes for awhile and I really like these. I also so appreciate the compostable packaging and firmer bristles. This is a great brush if you're looking to get into more eco-friendly practices, but are worried you'll lose the abrasive clean of your regular plastic toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Darren H.

customer_reviews.title: Earth is all we got
customer_reviews.text: Do you not like planet earth? Do earth a favor and pollute less with these biodegradable toothbrushes
customer_reviews.author: Yovani Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting Tough Brushes
customer_reviews.text: Really high quality. They last 5 times longer than regular oral b type toothbrushes. Big fan.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! I was so hesitant about these because the ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I was so hesitant about these because the brush heads look large. I have a very small mouth and it's tough to reach a brush around my molars. My assumption was that I need brushes with small heads to do this. Wrong! This toothbrush is amazing. It easily reaches around all of my curvy teeth, and all the way in the back. I also have a weird touch issue; the feeling of certain things (newspaper, popsicle sticks) make me cringe. I was worried about that happening with these brushes, and it hasn't really. I will keep purchasing these and LOVE that they're not plastic :)
customer_reviews.author: Elyse

customer_reviews.title: Best toothbrushes ever I buy these all the time for ...
customer_reviews.text: Best toothbrushes ever I buy these all the time for my girlfriend and I. Bristles are very gentle on the gums, and I like how they don't fray. I have a busy schedule so I actually use them to floss as I brush my teeth and they work perfectly. Even my long time dentist asked for a picture of my teeth for a yelp review. Thank you Mothers vault. I love your product. Another feature I love is I throw the tooth brush in my worm or regular composter and I feel like inoculating It with the microbes in my mouth helps put a piece of myself into my garden.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about this toothbrush except the hardness of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this toothbrush except the hardness of the bristles. The description listed them as soft yet I found them exceedingly hard. I used this brush for almost two weeks before deciding my gums where becoming damaged and the throbbing pain was not subsiding. I would definitely buy these if they made truly soft bristle toothbrushes!
customer_reviews.author: A. Beach

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to like this
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old daughter went through 2 of the toothbrushes in the last month. The bristles get warn down too fast. Won't be rebuying
customer_reviews.author: dakao

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart
customer_reviews.text: The brush fell apart in the first use. I was sad since they are among the few companies with toddler brush sizes. :(
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda

customer_reviews.title: I love that not only is the toothbrush recyclable
customer_reviews.text: I love that not only is the toothbrush recyclable, but the packaging is as well! I also learned that when purchasing from Mother's Vault, a portion of my purchase is donated to charity which is awesome. This is the first time I am trying a bamboo toothbrush, and the toothbrush feels like a normal toothbrush. I'd recommend trying this out, and composting it when it is time to order a new one!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: My FAVORITE bamboo toothbrushes!
customer_reviews.text: My FAVORITE bamboo toothbrushes, they are not too soft, much closer to a hard/medium that soften over time. They hold up and do a great job cleaning my teeth!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend the bristles fall out easily.
customer_reviews.text: Bristles kept falling out of all four of the tooth brushes. Started within 2 days of first usage.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic brush, just wish there was color differences
customer_reviews.text: I love these toothbrushes - great shape and size. Only issue is having no way to identify / tell the difference between two or more brushes. My toddlers are used to going and getting their own brush. Would be great if there was a different natural color stain on each brush. Otherwise, love them.
customer_reviews.author: Travel Maura

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.text: The company is eager to be your supplier and offers encouragement and help if needed. Their products are interesting and I will be trying other items in the future. The toothbrushes arrived in good time. They have soft bristles, the handles are secure, and the cost is not outrageous the cost of many "green" products are. I am well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Fell down on fabrication
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this, but the bristles come out and make for an unpleasant brushing experience. Sadly, a thumbs down on execution. Idea is great though.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren V.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to reach the nooks and crannies!
customer_reviews.text: I personally did not like these brushes. It is pretty large therefore very hard to get in those hard to reach places. I still have my wisdom teeth (they came in correctly) and they are impossible to reach with these brushes. I had to go with another brush that is unfortunately not as eco-friendly. :(
customer_reviews.author: Ashley T.

customer_reviews.title: Good toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting too much from an "eco-friendly" toothbrush, I thought they'd be hard/uncomfortable to use. The bristles are really soft. The bamboo part is more narrow than most toothbrushes, but I feel like that helps when cleaning the bristles, no hard to reach center where food sometimes gets stuck (such a pain to clean). I will definitely reorder.
customer_reviews.author: McGarnagle

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush, super durable, great quality, looks great
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Got what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: The toothbrushes arrived quickly after I ordered them. The handle is sturdy, enabling a good grip. The box is compostible. The price is good - when you buy four, it's competitive with the plastic ones or better. But mostly, I like that I'm not adding more plastic to the universe. We'll keep being customers!
customer_reviews.author: D. Britt

customer_reviews.title: Permanently switching to bamboo!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to permanently switch to bamboo toothbrushes because of the impact of plastic on our environment. These toothbrushes are amazing! The head is bigger, (longer and wider) and I feel like I'm doing my part for Mother Earth.
customer_reviews.author: Diva

customer_reviews.title: Not so great unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping I would like these. Great idea but couldn't stand the texture of these brushes. I will send my toothbrushes to terracycle until I find an alternative toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Loki15

customer_reviews.title: Best toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: My favorite toothbrush. Love that when I'm done I can recycle it. They come in boxes no plastic, which is nice when you are storing them or travelling.
customer_reviews.author: mizzrena34

customer_reviews.title: Soft and strong
customer_reviews.text: My whole family has switched to these toothbrushes, and I don't see us ever going back. I love that they come in zero plastic. We also appreciate that the bristles are soft but strong, as my partner brushes his teeth really hard.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Even better than my name-brand brush
customer_reviews.text: I've used these for a year now; my dentist says my teeth are as healthy as when I used an electric brush (brush in circles and for 2 minutes!). I've just purchased another year's supply. Very soft bristles and even lighter than my plastic brush. Great brush
customer_reviews.author: NCgirl

customer_reviews.title: SO comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: SO comfortable to use, really feels like a good clean. I just break off the brush part when it gets old, and compost the stick. The price is economical too. Very pleased with this new life choice. Now if only the bristle were biodegradeable too :-) However I have not found any on the market that are.
customer_reviews.author: mama

customer_reviews.title: No more plastic waste from toothbrushes!
customer_reviews.text: Love this toothbrush! High quality materials and socially conscious company. The bristles are soft enough on the gums but firm enough to really clean your teeth. Bamboo stays clean and intact. A portion of every sale is donated to EarthJustice, the nation’s largest nonprofit environmental law organization. I'm sold.
customer_reviews.author: enginebooks

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted. No plastic window, a ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. No plastic window, a fully cardboard box--but it came in a bubble wrapped envelope so I'm taking a star off for that. When I need to reorder I'll check that that's not happening anymore before hand.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: The search is over :)
customer_reviews.text: Finally I've located the perfect toothbrush made of bamboo, pleasant feel in the mouth, the bristles are soft and yet firm enough to give the super clean feel ... well done ! Definitely purchasing these again !
customer_reviews.author: Dra. A Ghosh

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toothbrushes! The bristles are a bit longer than standard bristles and soft. They do a great job cleaning long the gun line. I switched my whole family: SO, 11y/o daughter, and roommate, all skeptical at first, but then all on board the first time they used theirs. So very happy with this product and will order again in 3 months when it's time to replace our current brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Potter

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: I was worried this would have a wooden taste, it does not. Works better than my previous plastic brush. At about the same price as a moderately priced plastic brush, this is a bargain because it doesn't harm the environment. Bamboo is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Water + bamboo = MOLD!
customer_reviews.text: We were super excited to use this product, but after only two days of use, I noticed the bottoms of our toothbrushes are MOLDING. Like the average human, we keep our toothbrushes in a little cup on the counter which evidently is not the right way to store a bamboo toothbrush. So disappointed and unsanitary.
customer_reviews.author: Bryson Maddrn

customer_reviews.title: Great toothbrush!
customer_reviews.text: It is just a tiny adjustment to use. I had no problems at all. If you are a hard brusher, you have to be a little careful at first, but it gets my teeth clean, and prevents plastic from getting in the ocean!!!!!!! Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Tena P.

customer_reviews.title: You have to make sure to dry off the toothbrush after each use or it’ll start to go bad.
customer_reviews.text: On first use some of the brissels came out, but since then they have stayed in tact. You have to make sure to dry off the toothbrush after each use or it’ll start to go bad.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy Unger

customer_reviews.title: I love these tooth brushes - I have had no issue ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these tooth brushes - I have had no issue with brussles falling out like I have had with other brands. I would recommend these to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylyn

customer_reviews.title: Good size, good taste
customer_reviews.text: Some bamboo toothbrushes I've had have a super strong bamboo taste. This one doesn't- you can definitely taste it but it's not overpowering. I also have sort of a small mouth and was a bit concerned about the size of the head and bristles but it ended up being perfect! Great product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: I love that these are bamboo and help with the environment. The only brand I buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Shawgo

customer_reviews.title: Its weird at first with wood in one's mouth - ...
customer_reviews.text: Its weird at first with wood in one's mouth - but that's quickly disposed of as the soft bristles massage the gums and brighten the smile!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: First time buyer, expectations exceeded
customer_reviews.text: The bristles are very soft so they don't hurt my gums. It also cleans my teeth very well and gets the stuff out of the crevices. Also the materials and cause behind it is very Eco and Animal friendly which I love! I probably won't buy toothbrushes from any other company except for Mother Vault.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: YESSSS!
customer_reviews.text: YES! I love that I am finding products that are eco friendly & bio degradable! It is truly disturbing how many plastic tooth brushes end up in landfills & pollute the earth. Any way I can help, I will. Soft bristles, white bristles, sleek design! Thanks for this product, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with my purchase. It is just as it was advertised. I would repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Toothbrush - But Too Soft
customer_reviews.text: I really like the idea behind these toothbrushes and I actually love the simplicity of them. The bristles are soft and feel nice. The only complaint I have is that it's a little too soft for me. I usually like a "medium" bristle toothbrush, and these just aren't quite stiff enough. I do love them though and will probably continue to use them, I just wish that they came in different hardness's.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Ziesenis

customer_reviews.title: ... a delay in shipping but other than that I love these. Some reviewers were vary of the bristles ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a delay in shipping but other than that I love these. Some reviewers were vary of the bristles being too soft. I think they're perfect, in fact your bristles shouldn't be too hard. My mouth feels good, and my conscious feels good.
customer_reviews.author: NoName

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo is the way to go, eco minded consumers
customer_reviews.text: very nice toothbrush, medium bristles, not tough as some say, the bamboo is silky smooth, feels very natural. eco friendly packaging and eco friendly bamboo brushes. I am loving them. thanks mothesvault.
customer_reviews.author: Rough Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... these toothbrushes from your store and I am completely satisfied every single time
customer_reviews.text: I continuously order these toothbrushes from your store and I am completely satisfied every single time. No complaints here! I love that you are dedicated to helping the environment and I love feeling like I'm not only assisting you in accomplishing that goal but that I am also helping a small business. Thank you for this wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: These toothbrushes are great! We've switched to bamboo from plastic toothbrushes and ...
customer_reviews.text: These toothbrushes are great! We've switched to bamboo from plastic toothbrushes and we do not regret making the switch.
customer_reviews.author: Harper

product_meta.title: Mother’s Vault Bamboo Toothbrushes | Child Size Bamboo Toothbrush - 6 Inch Handle & 1 Inch Head | Natural Kids Toothbrush | Biodegradable & Eco Friendly | Medium/Soft BPA-Free Nylon Bristles
product_meta.description:
HOW LONG DOES A BAMBOO TOOTHBRUSH LAST?

Just because we’re natural doesn’t mean we don’t last as long as plastic toothbrushes. In fact, we last just as long before needing replacement (roughly 3 months). The Mother’s Vault Bamboo Toothbrush is the right step to go green and reduce your carbon footprint while getting the same great results! Our BPA-Free bristles also protect the health of you and your children by not leeching unwanted hormone disruptors into your body.

WHY USE A BAMBOO TOOTHBRUSH?

You know it, we know it, and the world knows it. Isn’t it time we started to find better, more natural ways of doing things? Plastic toothbrushes pollute oceans and are composed of harmful by-products. A bamboo toothbrush is a sustainable alternative that naturally decomposes in landfills. Compared to a plastic toothbrush that takes over 400 years to decompose, you can see why buying a natural toothbrush can make you feel good about your health and the environment. A big part of switching to a bamboo toothbrush is to reduce waste. Therefore, the packaging needs to be eco-friendly as well which is why we don’t include cellophane bags, plastic shells, or clear windows in the box.

GUARANTEE

 We love this toothbrush, and we’re sure you will to. If for any reason you don’t, no worries! Send it back our way for a full refund of the purchase price.

MOTHER'S VAULT

 A portion of every sale at Mother's Vault is donated to EarthJustice, the nation’s largest nonprofit environmental law organization. EarthJustice was created to protect people’s health, preserve magnificent places and wildlife, and combat climate change. We love what they’re doing to fight for better environmental laws and protect this wonderful place we live in.

BRUSH BETTER TODAY WITH MOTHER’S VAULT AND CLICK THE “ADD TO CART” BUTTON!!
feature_bullets: ★ GET THE BEST BAMBOO TOOTHBRUSH SET - Voted #1 best bamboo toothbrush on Amazon by several online blogs. Pack comes with 4 Eco Friendly Toothbrushes with smooth handles and soft BPA-Free nylon bristles. These are the perfect bamboo toothbrushes for your children (not babies/toddlers). The packaging is biodegradable and plastic free.

★ CHILD SIZE BAMBOO TOOTHBRUSHES - Smaller bamboo toothbrush size - 6” handles and 1” head - makes it easier for your children to brush their teeth. These natural bamboo toothbrush handles are lightweight and comfortable. Beeswax coating prevents splintering making the bamboo toothbrush smooth and long-lasting. The handles are slightly curved for a snug fit and better brush control.

★ MEDIUM/SOFT WAVY BRISTLES FOR BETTER CLEAN - By using BPA free nylon, we offer the same great quality and clean that a normal toothbrush does without using chemical and toxin leaching plastics! Best of all, the bristles are not too hard, and not too soft, and are well crafted to stay in place and not fall out. The wavy design hugs tooth surfaces and gums to remove plaque and bacteria from your teeth.

★ GREEN LIVING – A bamboo toothbrush is a great sustainable alternative. Whether it’s used for compost or the recycling bin, our biodegradable toothbrushes keep their value even when your mouth is done with them and will naturally decompose in a landfill. NOTE: The bristles aren’t biodegradable. Use pliers to remove them from the head and then reuse or compost the bamboo handle.

★ ZERO WASTE PACKAGING - The packaging and materials return to the environment safely. The cardboard is 100% biodegradable and all wasteful materials, such as plastic windows and cellophane bags, have been removed from the packaging process. The box your bamboo toothbrushes come in is just as environmentally-friendly as the toothbrush itself.
